set.name: Outlaws of Thunder Junction Breaking News

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tumblewaggs Migrating on Southern Trail - Stampedes Expected

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cleave {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.) Destroy target attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ambush Justified? Holes in Story, Sheriff Unresolved

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Journey to Nowhere enters the battlefield, exile target creature. When Journey to Nowhere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barkeep Reports Theft of Bottle - Customers Report Theft of Barkeep

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Domain - This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control. When Leyline Binding enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Leyline Binding leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent searched their library this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Target opponent mills thirteen cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heist Shocker! Supposedly Invincible Vault Vinced!

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target spell. • Target player draws two cards. • Gain control of target nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile two blue cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Gain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell is an artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker, the permanent enters the battlefield under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Off the Rails? Serial Train Robber Strikes Again!

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target creature spell. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Might or Magic? Recent Clash Fuels Debate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fighting Fire with Fire Ineffective, Reports Flammable Wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent cast three or more spells this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Exile any number of target spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sheriff Bans Rootin' - Is Tootin' Next?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dissolutions Increasing - Are Varmints to Blame?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent discards two cards. Raid - If you attacked this turn, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Homesteader Robbed for Third Time This Week

property.name: Rules
property.value: Change the target of target spell with a single target. You lose life equal to that spell's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Champion of Justice Just Iced - Killer on the Loose!

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Town Takeover! Sterling Company Expands Territory Again

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Local Man Defies Death, Morticians Mortified!

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Choose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Billy, please don't forget to add the headline before sending for publication again. - Clara

property.name: Rules
property.value: Escalate {1} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or more - • Target player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards. • Collective Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature. • Collective Defiance deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crackle with Power deals five times X damage to each of up to X targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Quint-Blaster" Inventor Promises Five Times the Fun

property.name: Rules
property.value: Electrodominance deals X damage to any target. You may cast a spell with mana value X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where There's Thunder, There's Lightning - Blaster Disaster Vaporizes Safety Inspector!

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Notorious Hellspur Comes Out Ahead in Violent Conflict

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy X target artifacts and/or creatures. For each permanent destroyed this way, its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until an artifact or creature card is revealed and exiles that card. Those players put the exiled cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Skewer the Critics deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Maligned Thespian Stares, Hurls Daggers at Disparaging Audience

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevented this turn. Skullcrack deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sterling Enforcer Can't Stand Heat, or at All

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crack Shot Snipes First Prize in Omenport's "Thunder Trial"

property.name: Rules
property.value: If it's not your turn, you may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Destroy up to two target artifacts and/or enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: General Store Faces Thorny Problems, Spiking Prices

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy up to X target artifacts and/or enchantments. Create twice X 1/1 black and green Pest creature tokens with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pest Problem Plagues Eatery - "Never Thought I'd Miss the Rats," Owner Laments

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Target player gains 7 life. • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library. • Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn. Then it fights up to one target creature you don't control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with flying. Cycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Local Purveyor Honest Rutstein Clarifies, Strengthens "No Refunds" Policy

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nonland permanent. You lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Somber Day in Omenport as Another Hero Laid to Rest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. When you do, it fights up to one target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hellspurs Unleash Newest Members on Unsuspecting Town!

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When Buried in the Garden enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent you don't control until Buried in the Garden leaves the battlefield. Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rage on the Omenport Express! Cramped Dragon Takes Matter into Own Claws

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land. (You can't cast this spell unless you have legal choices for all its targets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tragedy Strikes! And Again! And Again! And Again!

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.) • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bear Dismayed to Discover Food Chain Keeps Going

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Detention Sphere enters the battlefield, you may exile target nonland permanent not named Detention Sphere and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent. When Detention Sphere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The owner of target spell, nonland permanent, or card in a graveyard puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nonland permanent. Each player other than its controller creates a token that's a copy of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Reality Breach Engulfs Town - All Four Mayors Urge Caution

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell that targets you or a permanent you control. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hats Off! Quick-Thinking Sterling Merc Puts a Cap on Surprise Attack

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Onlookers Delighted as Sterling Agent Brought Low

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards. Then you may discard a nonland card. When you do, Hypothesizzle deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Science Outbreak Spreads - Officials Recommend Avoiding Books

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Ionize deals 2 damage to that spell's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Backfire Bummer! Sizzling Slinger Singes Slickshot

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") [+1]: Target artifact or creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Elk creature with base power and toughness 3/3. −5: Exchange control of target artifact or creature you control and target creature an opponent controls with power 3 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one at random. Create a red and white creature token with those characteristics. • 3/1 Human Warrior with trample and haste. • 2/1 Human Cleric with lifelink and haste. • 1/2 Human Rogue with haste and "When this creature enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target blocking creature. Creatures that were blocked by that creature this combat gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rolling Thunder! Angry Armadillo Assaults Architecture

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top two cards of target opponent's library. Exile one of them face down and put the other on the bottom of that library. You may play the exiled card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell. Flashback {1}{U}{B}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Madness {B}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Akul Disposes of Would-Be Usurper - Sheriff Tries to Put Pieces Together

property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less. • Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.value: Killer New Act Haunts Local Haunt

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent exiles the top X cards of their library. You may cast any number of spells with mana value X or less from among them without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some Robber Barons Get Just Desserts, Others Just Deserted

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Destroy target nonland permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stagecoach Encounters One More Magical Vortex than Expected

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slimy Service at Saloon Sends Scamp Scrambling

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Contagion Engine enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature target player controls. {4}, {T}: Proliferate twice. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there. Then do it again.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. If two cards that share a color were milled this way, repeat this process.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tarnation Weaponsmith Enters Third Month of Sharpening: "It's Almost Ready"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Mindslaver: You control target player during that player's next turn. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)

property.value: Invention Heralded as Revolutionary - Reviewer Gives Million-Star Rating
